Async v2 seems not to terminate when the call fails. The caller seems to keep forever the storage:

```
{
  "454c524f4e44564d404153594e43b83ca32e5773949932897290097c662dd7a70337b9da23d24f35684fb6c40594": "",
}
```

which seems to correspond to a callback storage.

# How to reproduce

```bash
npm install

npm run build

npm run test
```
